compatibility.notes: The FDK-AAC license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without significant restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the license text in all redistributions.
Provide source code for binary distributions.
State any modifications made to the original software.
license.name: FDK-AAC
obligations: Retain the complete text of the software license in redistributions in source code form.
Retain the complete text of the software license in documentation and/or other materials provided with redistributions in binary form.
Make available free of charge copies of the complete source code of the FDK AAC Codec and modifications to recipients of binary form.
Do not use the name of Fraunhofer to endorse or promote products derived from this library without prior written permission.
Do not charge copyright license fees for anyone to use, copy, or distribute the FDK AAC Codec software or modifications.
Prominently state changes made to the software and the date of any change in modified versions.
Replace the term 'Fraunhofer FDK AAC Codec Library for Android' with 'Third-Party Modified Version of the Fraunhofer FDK AAC Codec Library for Android' in modified versions.
